post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Skill Requirements:

Education: Completion of college/CEGEP/vocational or technical training

Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Certified Computer Programmer (CCP)

Experience: 5 years or more

Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English

Programming Languages: Java, JSP, Object-Oriented programming languages

Computer and Technology Knowledge: Windows

Other Information:1.Must write "Java" in Subject line when applying.2.Position is an approx. 1 year full time contract role.3.Minimum 5-7 years of Java development is mandatory.4.List Java cert. in e-mail body

Employer: IT Axis Consulting Inc. (Placement Agency)
How to Apply:

Please apply for this job only in the manner specified by the employer. Failure to do so may result in your application not being properly considered for the position.



Location        Toronto, ON
Country        Canada
Rate        To be negotiated
Company        IT Axis Consulting Inc.
Contact        IT Axis Consulting Inc.
Reference        JS4887223
Posted Date        02/03/2010 01:15:07
post.title: Java - (Agency)
